targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE ("type" = 'traffic-stats.rxpps' OR "type" = 'traffic-stats.txpps') AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "device", "type" fill(null)
SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'egress_stats.if_pkts' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"
SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_pkts' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"
SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "type" = 'interface.rx_traffic_stats.rx_packets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'traffic-stats.rxbps' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "interface", "type" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'traffic-stats.txbps' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "interface", "type" fill(null)
SELECT derivative("value", $interval)*8 FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'egress_stats.if_octets' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"
SELECT derivative("value", $interval)*8 FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_octets' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "type" = 'interface.rx_traffic_stats.rx_bytes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE ( "type" = 'traffic-stats.rxmcpkt' OR "type" = 'traffic-stats.rxbcpkt' OR "type" = 'traffic-stats.rxucpkt' ) AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface", "type", "device"

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE ( "type" = 'traffic-stats.txmcpkt' OR "type" = 'traffic-stats.txucpkt' OR "type" = 'traffic-stats.txmcpkt' ) AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_uc_pkts' OR "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_bc_pkts' OR "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_mc_pkts' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE  ("type" = 'egress_stats.if_uc_pkts' OR "type" = 'egress_stats.if_bc_pkts' OR "type" = 'ingress_stats.if_mc_pkts') AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE ( "type" = 'interface.tx_mac_stats.tx_unicast_packets' OR "type" = 'interface.tx_mac_stats.tx_multicast_packets' AND "type" = 'interface.tx_mac_stats.tx_broadcast_packets') AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"

SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "type" = 'interface.rx_mac_stats.rx_unicast_packets' OR "type" = 'interface.rx_mac_stats.rx_multicast_packets' AND "type" = 'interface.rx_mac_stats.rx_broadcast_packets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "type"

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'traffic-stats.rxcrcerr' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device", "interface", "type" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'ingress_errors.if_in_frame_errors' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device", "interface", "type" fill(null)
SELECT derivative("value", $interval) FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'egress_queue_info.packets' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", "egress_queue"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'queue-stats.queue-depth' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "interface"
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND "type" = 'egress_queue_info.cur_buffer_occupancy' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface"
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'global_packet_buffer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "pfe", "linecard"
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'queue-stats.latency' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface", "device"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'route_table_ipv6' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "pfe", "memory"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'route_table_ipv4' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "pfe", "memory"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'multicast_table_ipv4' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "pfe", "memory"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'multicast_table_ipv6' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "pfe", "memory"
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.na" WHERE "memory" = 'firewall_table' OR "memory" = 'next_hop_table' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "pfe", "linecard", "memory"

list.name: Commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter
